title: Top Places to visit in Lepa Rada, Basar, Arunachal Pradesh
content:
Lepa Rada district is one of the 23 districts of Arunachal Pradesh state in northeastern India.
District is created by bifurcating the Lower Siang district with headquarters at Basar.
The district would have four administrative units Tirbin, Basar, Daring and Sago
Head Qua
